item.title: Automated the Mundane
item.description:
We often think that task automation is reserved for large tasks or companies rather than individuals. However this need not be the case.

A Few Minutes Can Save You Hours

Think about your process every morning when you first log into your computer to work. It may look something like this:

  • Open Outlook
  • Open a web browser
    • Navigate to your company portal
    • Open a new tab and navigate to other commonly used website(s)
  • Open your company chat app (Slack, Teams, etc.)
  • Open the application you use most for work (VS Code, MS Word, MS Excel, etc.)

You might say, “That only takes a minute, so what?” Well, that’s one minute every day, maybe more if you do it multiple times. You could spend five minutes writing a script and never have to do all of that again.
